website_summaries.verdict: If you can put up with the few quality concerns, you will be happy with this cooler if saving space is your top priority in a water cooler.
pros: A counter top model that offers similar functions as full-sized coolers, including hot/cold water dispensing and quiet operation
Most standard water bottles fit it
Has a convenient hot water spout child safety lock
cons: Water comes out slowly, and the cold water could be colder
Has a strange smell/taste that fades with use

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: What a great little tank. It has great 'pour pressure' if you needed to fill a pitcher of water for the dinner table, etc AND the hot is on all the time. The only drawback would be that the first day or so, the water had a bad taste, but I should have known better & rinsed it prior to use. We've had it a week now and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: LalaE

customer_reviews.title: Save your money - faulty device
customer_reviews.text: The only positive I can give this product is it arrived on time. However that’s a reflection of amazon and not the manufacturer. Hot and Cold do not work. Followed instructions and nothing. I spent $100 for a room temperature water dispenser. Why not return this item? Because even though it’s Prime it would cost me $30 to return it. It was too big and bulky to repack. I’m just going back to renting from my Water delivery company. Total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: DaBearsGal

customer_reviews.title: It's COLD! It's HOT! Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler is amazing! Very quiet, clean, and the water is right on point! HOT or COLD! Stays cool and hot at all times! I bought this for my students in my classroom and they LOVE it. Doesn't take up too much space at all! Follow the steps it comes with, and you'll have no issues! The price is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kiser

customer_reviews.title: It works fine but it is difficult to get the water bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: The Cooler was shipped promptly and arrived on time. It works fine but it is difficult to get the water bottle on the top as it has to go on perfectly and I end up spilling water every time. In comparison to the last one that I had, it is much more difficult and messy.
customer_reviews.author: mattyice

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend and that has a small number place and they loved it takes little space
customer_reviews.author: luisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Water Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: We love this, it’s fantastic. The hot is hot and the cold is cold. I would recommend a 3 1/2 gallon vs 5 if keep on counter, need a stool and it’s a bit heavy. Definitely recommend though, works beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had it up and running for just over a week but runs quiet, and we have hot and slightly cold water. Love how its fits on a divider wall in our kitchen. 👍
customer_reviews.author: jlf

customer_reviews.title: Still new and damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in October 2017. In April of this year ( 6 months after purchase ) and no reason why, it started leaking the water from underneath. To prevent a floor disaster and damage, I started taking the water through the cold valve... it was coming out hot!! VERY CONSERNING!!! I unplugged and it has been seating there since. I cant find the warranty or papers. I wish I can return it or get one undamaged
customer_reviews.author: catoinostroza

customer_reviews.title: In love with this dispenser
customer_reviews.text: In love with this dispenser, I have it for 2 weeks already and works great. I love the water temperature, hot for a perfect cup of tea or cold for a nice glass of refreshing water also love the cup holder on the small compartmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to open an set up out the box. Love the cup compartment. My favorite part is the option of hot and cold water. The hot water comes out hot enough to brew tea.
customer_reviews.author: Crisha 220

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my mom. With all the negative reviews she decided to open it up early to test it out and make sure there weren't any defects. So far it's been great. No issues whatsoever. Even got an email from the seller letting me know that if I have any issues with it to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Roque

customer_reviews.title: Great price but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I like the look and price. The build is a bit soft and easily sways with a 5 gallon on top. Smaller bottles will be more stable. Another thing is the push back lever to dispense the water comes forward too much so when you want the water to stop dispensing, some tends to spill out if you do back your cup off carefully. All in all it’s good bang for your bucks but needs some improvements for future models.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works perfect for my family and fits great on my counter. The water gets very hot and the water gets decently cool but I still need to add ice. Definitely worth the money! I’m hoping it holds up cause I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it! Only lasted two months!
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of days the water came out tasting horrible because of the plastic material scent was so strong. After that cleared out everything was going okay, the cold water wasn’t super cold like I’ve seen other water dispensers have. I ordered it beginning of April, it s now June and water started leaking out from a small whit knob in the back! Nothing was broken or messed with it was just super cheaply made! It didn’t come with a manual to help with any possible situations and now I can’t even return it. Save your money, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny medina

customer_reviews.title: Is cooler and hot water maker in my opinion is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and water coolers I've ever had , I used to get the one from the water company but I was always bending over breaking my back . This is great you just put it on the counter and use the 3 gallon jugs fantastic anyways the water is real hot for coffee to
customer_reviews.author: seaworthy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We just received our ew water cooler and so far it's doing what's expected! I have this same water cooler in my place of business, it gets used heavily as we go through 5 gallons of water almost every day. Different people change the water bottle and we've had that product for over a year now. I think with that wear and tear, our cooler at home, with much less usage will be great! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Water has a weird taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was compact and would fit great in my husband's mancave. I returned it because the water tasted awful. We changed the water out and it still had some type of chemical taste to it. I should have read the negative reviews before I bought it because I see there are other reviews with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Spent a month trying to get the very strong plastic taste to go away, nothing worked. Then came home to water everywhere. Thought it was my coffee maker. Kept finding pools of water. Turned out the cooler had been leaking out of the bottom the entire time! Can't believe this was $100.
customer_reviews.author: Japauley

customer_reviews.title: Overall, quite pleased!
customer_reviews.text: After one week, so far so good! The unit is functioning well. Hot water is HOT! The unit is light and easy to move around...even carefully with the water jug attached. The only downside so far is that the first 5 gallon jug of water and a REALLY strong plasticky chemical flavor. When I drained the two tanks before starting the new just the cold water drain cap pulled in two as I removed it...I'm going to try and communicate with the vendor to get a couple replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Immel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. My old cooler developed a leak and I needed a new one. I came across this one and thought what a clever Idea. I can put something under it that can add storage and not wasted space like my old one. Setup was super easily and I couldn't be happier with it. It's also such a smart looking cooler. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nicksc

customer_reviews.title: make sure to was the lines before you drink from the hot water or it will taste like hose.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is making life so much easier for me. I was using a Britta pitcher that I had to refill multiple times a day and if anyone else in the house emptied it, there was a good chance it wouldn't be full when I was thirsty. And to not have to wait for the water to heat up on the stove for a cup of tea is so sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Very hot water but just above room temperature “cold” water.
customer_reviews.text: The shipment arrived early. The item is great except that the cold water is barely cold. The hot water is amazingly hot. You can cook soups and other noodles in the hot water. I would rate it a five if the cold water was colder.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Jangles

customer_reviews.title: Leaking machine ruined my hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this machine for a little over a year now and it is leaking. We just filled our water jugs and went to go poor a glass of water the next day and noticed that the jug was significantly empty compared to the night before. We look on the ground and the wood table that the machine was on and notice water pooled up everywhere. The machine ruined my table and water logged our hardwood floors. We are very upset and disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our clients love the extra service of a hot cup of tea ...
customer_reviews.text: The water cooler is ideal for our massage business. The hot and cold can be turned on or off independently, so it doesn't run when we don't need it. Our clients love the extra service of a hot cup of tea or a cold glass of water after their session. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good value-water not so tasty
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good value for your money however the water has a plastic taste that I cannot get rid of. I have tried vinegar and lemon and the plastic like taste of the water does not go away. A little bit disheartening because it is a good nice working machine .
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Cold Water Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Defective. Cold Water doesn't work. I emailed the manufacturer and haven't heard back yet either. Very skeptical now...
customer_reviews.author: SnagglePuss

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Mess!
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this product was great and we loved it...for 2 weeks. After that, whenever the water jug would get low, the water would leak out from the side of the cooler. Not just drips but cups of water would pour out. We are serving overseas so returning the product would have been more cumbersome than it's worth. We have had a side table ruined from the water. Saving grace is that the cooler is located in an area where there is not flooring/carpet to ruin.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Our water tasted like plastic for a few months before filtering out. The machine does not heat or cool the water at all.
customer_reviews.author: KGRASS

customer_reviews.title: Cold water does not work anymore
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item. I have had since 03/2018 and several months ago the cold water stopped working. I contacted the manufacturer and they only offer a one year warranty. They said I could return the item at my expense to have it fixed. I asked for suggestions as to what the problem would be and they did not respond. They suggested that I take it to someone in my area to have it fixed if I didn’t want to send it back. Read the reviews, I was warned. Never again will I buy a product from this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: The water cooler was great to use, but unfortunately it stopped working after only two years. The cooling coil stopped working and it no longer cools down the water. Not great when it is 100 °F outside.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes like plastic still 3 days after use.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews so I don't have a leak yet but the dispenser looks nice yet when you drink the water you have the impression you drink plastic. I am surprised only a handful of people have reported this. Maybe people like plastic tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Hot water stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 6 months. Then got water just aburptly stopped working. Tried to return it on amazon but it’s outaide the return window. Tried to contact the company since it’s still under the one year warranty, company website has no email address or phone number, just an adddress in NY. So it’s impossible to utilize the warranty. What a scam this is.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I'm having problem when I flup the 5 gallon bottle onto the dispenser, the water gushes quite abit. Is there an unsert that goes into the beck part of the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pereira

customer_reviews.title: worse product ever had a 3 gallons water on it ...
customer_reviews.text: worse product ever had a 3 gallons water on it and when coming back from work all my kitchen were water
customer_reviews.author: Tall

customer_reviews.title: I have to plug it and unplugged it on and of for it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this product again don't please don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Safe Fresh Water
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cold and hot water dispenser. I only use the 3 gallon bottles because I’m not strong enough to handle the 5 gallon bottles. Good value and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our new house. I like the size of it very compact. My dislikes when I opened it there was a crack on the front and a big ding on the back. I contacted the company and no response. The other problem was the hot water wayer was way too hot had to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: A little pricy for its functionality.
customer_reviews.text: It's light and it works fine. If you put a 5gallon tank on top, it will out weight the cooler which seems as if it will tip over. The cold water is not as cold as other coolers and the same for the hot water. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: plastic tasting water even after cleaned as directed by owners manual, cannot be used will never buy again from this company I will not let my dog drink from it.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Below standard to basic stand up units.
customer_reviews.text: The water tasted bad out of this unit. Tainted the whole bottle. The levers to dispense the water are not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Law

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for cooling water
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler doesn't work well for cooling water. (Only reason I bought it) The hot water works great just wished the cold side did too. Maybe I received a defective one but I will be buying from a different company next time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Williams

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: this is a cheap low end device. i have only had it a few months and now it's leaking. of course my return window has expired. waste of $! do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Anselmo Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Water runs slow, large for counter top.
customer_reviews.text: Water runs very slow. You will find yourself standing for a while trying to fill a large cup. I chose this item to be on the counter top because I didn’t like the tall standing water dispenser on my floor; this is still large for counter top. Hard to add jug to the top as there is a circular notch which enters the jug; water splashes everywhere. My son is 6’1” and still hard to add jug to top of container. I am not satisfied, but I waited too long to return.
customer_reviews.author: T-Money

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my water cooler. I use a 3 gallon container and had to go through my first 3 gallons to flush out the lines of newness. Taste wasnt awful but did taste odd. Second container and beyond tastes great. Its not refrigerator cold but runs by a fan so its colder than tap water. For me its perfect.. The hot water is absolutely great for coffee, instant oatmeal, etc. I use my hot and cold everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this. Water spills out everywhere when you fill it and it takes and plastic and taste never went away with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Hot tea no problem. Cold water, no problem. Child lock- no problem. Everything I need is here and the fact that it's not on a wall or floor is awesome. It's the right size for the counter. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in great shape. Instructions were not the best but they ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was shipped and received in a timely fashion. It arrived in great shape. Instructions were not the best but they were ok. The unit does exactly as it says it does. Super hot water and excellent cold water all the time. We love it . Now I can have a hot cup of tea whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Schoville

customer_reviews.title: Drinking more water than before.. bonus
customer_reviews.text: Since new you’ll probably waste your first jug due to the “new needs to be broken in” it needs to be rinsed/cleaned out. Before any real drinking. I used first boiling stuff for cooking. Otherwise it works great no problems so far. Like the disconnect switches in back for both hot and cold features it came with. Very practical for my needs and have delivery services. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Love the new water dispenser. Easy to use, nice looking and compact. A nice addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. I loved the fact that it was exactly as described by the seller. Convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Emills

customer_reviews.title: I would just recommend to shut it off when there's no more water
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day! Didn't have a problem setting up and it runs smooth always. I would just recommend to shut it off when there's no more water. Just follow the instructions and it will last you a long time. Really love this!
customer_reviews.author: Mari29

customer_reviews.title: The hot water function/tap stopped working after 4-6 months
customer_reviews.text: It keeps water cold and is easy to load. However, after 4-6 months the hot water stopped being hot. It is funny because I was always careful to turn it off at night when I left the office. I didn’t want to burn out the hot water heater.... It is sitting next to a Keurig from which my patients and I can get hot water so I didn’t send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sideways  Shrink

customer_reviews.title: It stays at room temperature the majority of times!
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, but that’s about it. Both hot and cold water stay at room temperature and water has after taste. It kicks in randomly to heat the water, but it doesn’t necessarily mean it’s at the time you need it hot. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ihana

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Worth the buy easy compact for counter...super hot water for coffee or cup of noodles..good extended warranty..worth it worth it...
customer_reviews.author: gerikaa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: The cheap plastic material makes the water taste horrible!!! 🤮🤢 Also, the cold water is more like warm water lol. Don’t waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Practical and convenient
customer_reviews.text: The water comes out extremely hot. I love it, no flaws or problems
customer_reviews.author: ellie Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: The hot water no longer works, is there a warranty on this cooler? - Is there a quick fix?
customer_reviews.author: Lucille D Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I waited almost a year to write a review- hot and cold options just quit yesterday for no reason. Light for power is on but the cold and hot light no longer light up and neither are dispensing as such. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: Was loving my water cooler from the get go, until I woke up this morning with my kitchen just about flooding. The cool water side is leaking. Not sure how to fix it or if I can replace it, I haven't had it more than 2-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like plastic
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but I felt like I was drinking plastic molten liquid. The flavor of the water was horrific. I contact the customer service, followed all of their instructions on how to clean out the tank and soak it with lemon and baking soda and all of the things to try to get rid of the taste and nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Experience Adele (Andrea)

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put at my teacher's coffee station so they could have good water. I just found out that neither the hot nor the cold work. They both dispense just about room temperature water. I'm going to read back through everything to make sure there isn't something I missed. Not Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: kt Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I could buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: The cold button does not work, the water is not cold. Also 3.5 gallons later the water still smells plastic. If it was not a hustle I would return this yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: sarah Mbabazi

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Showed up fast.....have only used it a day but works as advertised so far.....good design
customer_reviews.author: M. Marc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get cold enough
customer_reviews.text: The hot side gets nice an hot perfect for instant coffee or cup of soup but the cold side does not get cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Just nearly a month with it, and it leaked!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this unit for a month, and today I came home to a huge puddle on the floor, all water leaked! It is quite a disappointment as I purchased this Nutrichef Water Dispenser thinking it would last.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: so far so good... only complaints... the water doesn't get AS cold as some other units and the little door on the side doesn't close all the way. But the system seems to work great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Helvetica

customer_reviews.title: Ughh
customer_reviews.text: Horrid plastic taste and I noticed the hidden California cancer warning after I bought it. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Idontknowanametouse

customer_reviews.title: Slow water and not too cold
customer_reviews.text: The first two weeks the water was tasting bad but now it’s good. It comes out very slow but it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cezar Ayran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Cold is just above freezing no ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, Cold is just above freezing no ice needed, hot is close to boiling. Hot is compared to fresh brewed coffee. Product arrived 3 days earlier then posted.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Prokos

customer_reviews.title: Not enough cold dispersed  before warmer water flows out.
customer_reviews.text: Hot water is great for instant beverages. The cold runs out and becomes Luke warm after 15 or is dispersed. Bummer if you have a big portable water bottle. I guess fill up night before and refrigerate?
customer_reviews.author: Jonnyb

customer_reviews.title: Do your research...
customer_reviews.text: It’s been almost two months and this machine still makes the water taste like new plastic. I’ve tried everything to get ride of it and no luck. The hot water is super slow and the dispenser pegs are pretty flimsy so it’s not a good one for kids. We are back to using our manual hand pump. You get what you pay for i guess...
customer_reviews.author: JJLiddle

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Works
customer_reviews.text: We had this two months and the water will no longer come out of the hot faucet and has slowed a great deal from the cold. We now are looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2-3 years until it quits cooling/heating
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this product. Recently the hot/cold quit working. After a few minor troubleshooting attempts to no avail we are counting this one as dead. Probably a 2-3 hear run but still recommend buying, just know it will eventually quit heating/cooling rendering it useless at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Wish the water came out faster and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wish the water came out faster and we don't have small children so I would like the safety disabled on the hot. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Frank D.

customer_reviews.title: Fix
customer_reviews.text: Easy to break.watwr not getting cold anymore after a year warranty🙈
customer_reviews.author: noel l pagaragan

customer_reviews.title: Great but requires muscles
customer_reviews.text: Overall very nice product. For people who are not that tall it probably is a challenge to lug the bottle into the dispenser since it is up on the countertop and the bottles are usually 5 gallons... Better bring your muscles. That is the only reason I gave it "only" 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrin B.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This product leaked from the bottom of the unit. 5 gallons of water on wood floors. Do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Tippett

customer_reviews.title: so far seems to be great. water is HOT and cold as advertised
customer_reviews.text: just set up yesterday. so far seems to be great. water is HOT and cold as advertised. runs quite. really like that it takes up so little space...great on counter-top instead of floor. only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I have only used it one day. will update after 30 days
customer_reviews.author: KERRY MICKLER

customer_reviews.title: Great little water cooler
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for almost a year and it is great! We have it upstairs so the kids don’t have to come down for a cold drink. It’s able to be out of the way in the corner. We haven’t noticed any plastic or other strange flavor from it. It is not very loud when the motor is on. Overall was a great purchase. It fits perfectly on the ikea gladom table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dispenser is a good size. the water temperatures for hot & cold ...
customer_reviews.text: dispenser is a good size. the water temperatures for hot & cold are very good. purchased this for my office, works out fine. holds 3 gallon bottles with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time & money
customer_reviews.text: Bigger machine than expected. Even with multiple rinsing water tasted nasty. Water didn't cool properly... reservoir was actually boiling the water... steam was coming up on the bottle thus heating it. Such a hassle with repair or replacement, not worth the extra money they want me to shell out when it was a manufacturer defect in the first place. Was unable to reach manufacturer, repair center could not help much. Good thing Amazon helped me out. I got a partial refund after shiping item back... CHARGED 2 EXPERIENCE!!! was not a hapy customer with this product. Don't waste your time & money.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my buffet table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my buffet table. It is off the ground and doesn’t take much space. Cold water is cold and the hot is hot. It is quiet also.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Dorland

customer_reviews.title: Water smells plastic even after a while!
customer_reviews.text: After a month and 6 five gallon of waters it still SMELLS PLASTIC! I would return it but I don't have the box anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hanny from SD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT....
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it would be.....best purchase I've made in a while. Works very well, hot water is hot & cold water is cold. Looks better than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good water at a good price
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended and is good value for the money. Also it will not take too much space to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Duran

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have had this almost a year and so far no leaks or other problems. I’d buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: ZonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great until it started leaking.
customer_reviews.text: Had it 6 months and now it leaks. So it’s now in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: False advertising. Said like new working.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like spending $100 tonopen a completely damaged item with stickers they forgot to remove the sticker stating broken.
customer_reviews.author: Delainie Baker

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it. We can’t get the plastic taste out ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like it. We can’t get the plastic taste out of our water no matter what. We tried flushing it and running water through it but it still tastes like plastic. It's useless at this point and I really wish I could still get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: alex zablotsky

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like plastic .. and the water that comes out smells like plastic why I’m not sure .. is it safe not sure ... usually takes 10 gallons to clear this up ..not good ..
customer_reviews.author: gabriel vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The machine is really great and easy to use. I have a small problem after a few months of using but I contacted the company’s customer service and got everything resolved within a few days. Overall I really like this product and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our home cannot go wrong with this buy
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This machine brings a nasty taste that affects the water.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar S.

customer_reviews.title: Leaking water from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water machine and it started leaking from the bottom after one month. Not an ideal product
customer_reviews.author: Mari Abeyta

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made! Makes water taste like plastic! I got rid of the box and don’t have a car so returning it is impossible such a waste of money ;(
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Cold water function stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Cold water function stopped working even though it shows it is working, so wasting space, electricity, money. Wish I could return but it's been too long.
customer_reviews.author: amanda perez

customer_reviews.title: Very good. I get why there is a safety feature ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I get why there is a safety feature on the hot water tap but wish there wasn't since the product is used in an office where only adults work.
customer_reviews.author: Owen J. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This item broke after only 3 uses now it leaks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great but has burnt plastic taste at fist two jugs
customer_reviews.author: Linda Patton

customer_reviews.title: Good but beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and loved it at first. Heating and cooling worked well. Now I’ve Owned this product for a few months and the cooling unit stopped working. And of course I’m not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Carr

product_meta.title: Nutrichef Countertop Water Cooler Dispenser - Hot & Cold Water, with Child Safety Lock. (Silver)
product_meta.description: NutriChef Model : PKTWC10SLHot & Cold Water Dispenser Water Dispenser Cooler Hot & Cold Water Cooler Dispenser System, Countertop Style Features: Automatic Water Dispenser System Simple Electric Plugin Design Builtin Compressor for Quick Water Cooling Ability to Dispense Both Hot & Cold Water Simple & HassleFree Operation Universal Compatibility with 5Gallon Bottles/Jugs Countertop / Tabletop Design TopLoading Water Bottle Style Ultra Quiet Operation Technical Specs: Power Output: 500 Watt Heating, 65 Watt Cooling Cold Water Capacity: 2. 0 Liters / Hour Hot Water Capacity: 5. 0 Liters / Hour Cold Water Temperature: 5055° Fahrenheit Hot Water Temperature: 185205° Fahrenheit Construction Material: Engineered ABS Power Supply: 120/240VWater Dispenser Size (L x W x H): 12. 2’’ x 12. 6’’ x 20. 2’’ inches The NutriChef Water Dispenser Cooler Hot & Cold Water Cooler Dispenser System, Countertop Style Automatic Water Dispenser System Simple Electric Plugin Design Builtin Compressor for Quick Water Cooling Ability to Dispense Both Hot & Cold Water Simple & HassleFree Operation Universal Compatibility with 5Gallon Bottles/Jugs Countertop / Tabletop Design TopLoading Water Bottle Style Ultra Quiet Operation Power Output: 500 Watt Heating, 65 Watt Cooling Cold Water Capacity: 2. 0 Liters / Hour Hot Water Capacity: 5. 0 Liters / Hour Cold Water Temperature: 5055° Fahrenheit Hot Water Temperature: 185205° Fahrenheit Construction Material: Engineered ABS Power Supply: 120/240V Water Dispenser Size (L x W x H): 12. 2’’ x 12. 6’’ x 20. 2’’ inches.
feature_bullets: HOT & COLD WATER NOZZLE: with this water cooler you can choose between a Cold & Hot water, making it ideal for cool refreshments or toasty beverages. COLD WATER TEMP: 40-45°F HOT WATER TEMP: 170-175°F
WATER COOLER ACCOMMODATES: This countertop water cooler has the ability to accommodate 3 or 5-Gallon bottles/Jugs, it will save you hundreds of water bottles per year
WATER COOLER FEATURES: This tabletop water cooler is operating with an automatic electric plug-in water dispenser system for quick water cooling. Enjoy its ultra-quiet operation

IDEAL FOR HOME & OFFICE:With its innovative Tabletop design it is perfect for office & home,simple and hassle-free operation,no bottles around you messing up your office and fits in any corner.You will love convenience of this handy tabletop water cooler
CHILD SAFE: This product is equipped with a child safety lock on the hot water spout so the entire family can use it worry free
